arts.ttl: Aberdeen 'had to dream big' to beat Celtic - Thelin
arts.sum: Aberdeen manager Jimmy Thelin says "hard work" and "luck" contributed to his side's dramatic Scottish Cup final triumph over Celtic.

arts.ttl: Aberdeen end Celtic's treble dream to end 35-year Scottish Cup drought
arts.sum: Aberdeen shocked Celtic to win the Scottish Cup for the first time in 35 years to end the Hoops’ treble celebrations. Brendan Rodgers’ men looked destined to win...

arts.ttl: Calmness amid Celtic penalty drama and Aberdeen smash and grab is why unruffled Don Robertson is best we have
arts.sum: Record Sport's resident former ref Des Roache couldn't have been more impressed with the Hampden officials over 120 minutes

arts.ttl: 'It's Aberdeen's cup!' - Celtic stunned in Scottish Cup final shootout
arts.sum: Watch highlights of Aberdeen's dramatic Scottish Cup final penalty shootout win over Celtic.

arts.ttl: Celtic denied treble as Aberdeen hold nerve in Scottish Cup final penalty shootout
arts.sum: Dimitar Mitov saves two penalties as the Dons win shootout at Hampden Park to end 35-year wait

arts.ttl: Distraught Celtic show their true colours with Aberdeen trophy move as Rodgers consoles his heartbroken leader
arts.sum: The Dons came from behind to win but a gutted captain and his pals showed their class with a gesture after the whistle

arts.ttl: Celtic player ratings as Kasper Schmeichel sees Treble slip through his fingers to start Aberdeen party like it's 1990
arts.sum: The keeper's late blunder allowed Dons to equalise and they punished the champions with a shock penalty shoot-out victory

arts.ttl: Aberdeen 1-1 Celtic (4-3 on penalties): Highlights, man of the match, stats as the Dons stun the Hoops in Scottish Cup final
arts.sum: Aberdeen stun Celtic in the final of the Scottish Cup at Hampden Park on Saturday afternoon, with the Dons triumphing on penalties to win the trophy for the first time since 1990.

arts.ttl: Dimitar Mitov the Aberdeen hero as Celtic’s Treble dream wrecked in seismic Scottish Cup final shock - 5 talking points
arts.sum: It was a final low on quality for large spells but there was no shortage of drama as the Dons ended a 35-year wait to win the trophy

arts.ttl: Aberdeen player ratings as Dimitar Mitov is Celtic heartbreaker with penalty heroics to put Dons in Scottish Cup dreamland
arts.sum: Jimmy Thelin and his troops are the Scottish Cup winners and end the Hoops' hopes of a domestic Treble
